General.Name: Sineng Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Sineng Electric Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, maintenance, and trading of power electronic products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers photovoltaic inverters, such as string, centralized, and distributed inverters; and energy storage systems, which includes AC and DC energy storage converters. It also provides power quality control solutions, such as active power filters, low-voltage static var generators, and intelligent power quality correction devices; power station monitoring equipment for use in household, industrial and commercial, and ground power stations; and smart energy management systems. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.
